task.title: How to Open the Tool?
task.shortdesc: In this section, you will learn to start the Snipping Tool.

taskbody.prereq: Make sure that you are working on Windows 8.

step.cmd: Enter "Snipping Tool" in the search box.
Click on Snipping Tool from the list of programs.

taskbody.result: You can view the Snipping Tool application on your screen.
